thread.title: Great location for visiting Manhatten
thread.title_full: Great location for visiting Manhatten - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Fifth Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Uli H
title: Great location for visiting Manhatten
text:
We did a great deal on the Hotel it was a good price for Manhatten, this time of the year the hotels tend to have good deals.
The location is great on 37th street so your close to time square, and the conections to central park, as well close to go south with all metro conections beeing at 3 blocks from the hotel.
Its a busy town and a busy area of town, so if you want to stay like quiet in Manhatten you would need to choose something like upper east side or east village.
The staff is very friendly, the rooms are very nice we had one at the 15th floor which was great with a view of the empire state building. The windows are really good sealed so you have a nice rest.
Great is also the free breakfast where you get started into the day already eaten without the need to search for breakfast outside, it safes also some dolars having a good breakfast already included.
Important to notice is they will receive your packages if you send them to the hotel under your reservation name which is very convinient if you need to buy stuff online.
Room Tip: the higher the better See more room tips
